divs: Sighting DetailsFor two years I have been filming orbs in my area with a Samsung camcorder. I filmed mostly down my street at a culdesac. When I was about done filming, collecting 8 hours of footage, I was filming an orb in the east. When I turned around I was confronted with a big bright, white and round light. It was about 8 feet in diameter, as it hovered. When I first saw it I said, "What the hell is that?" Then I lifted the camera, and started filming it. Then a telepathic presence came over me on me, except down the middle of my back. Then while filming I became aware somehow of three greys in the object. One was a doctor, and the other two were workers. They were viewing me in a small monitor. The doctor alien said, "What is he doing?" Then the object retracted further out, until it looked like a dot of white light. It stopped at about 45& from the horizon, hovered for a couple of seconds then moved on northward. The telepathic presence on me quickly subsided. My film shows the object having a round metalic bottom, and at first looking like an upside down umbrella without a handle. I was very excited to experience this, and I surprisingly did not shake very much while filming. Thank you.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Garden Grove
There were no other sightings in Garden Grove on or around December 16th 2005
Summary: I turned around and there it was 30 yards away from me.
